articles.author: Edward Hon-Sing Wong
articles.title: Sinophobia won't save you from the coronavirus
articles.description: The anti-Chinese racism in the wake of the coronavirus outbreak has a long history in North America.
articles.content: Shortly after the first Canadian case of the new coronavirus was announced in January, David Shao, a healthcare worker from Winnipeg, the capital of Manitoba province, was taunted by colleagues to go home and stop "spreading the virus". He was not sick; he wa… [+6872 chars]

articles.author: Priyanka Gupta
articles.title: Coronavirus: Dozens of cases found onboard cruise ship
articles.description: About 3,700 people on the Diamond Princess are being quarantined for at least two weeks off of Japanâ€™s Yokohama port.
articles.content:
Thousands of passengers and crew are still stuck on board a cruise ship in the Japanese port of Yokohama.
The vessel has 64 confirmed cases of the coronavirus.
Al Jazeera's Priyanka Gupta reports.

articles.title: Coronavirus Outbreak: 'We need facts not fear'
articles.description: We ask China Global Television Network anchor Wang Guan about China's response to the spread of the virus.

articles.author: Betsy Joles
articles.title: Voices from Hubei, two weeks into lockdown
articles.description: A group of former high school classmates from Hubei spoke about the conditions of their family under lockdown.
articles.content: Group chats counting the number of those infected and dead reflect the grim reality of life in the current coronavirus outbreak, which started in Wuhan, Hubei Province, and has spread to every province in China, as well as Taiwan, Hong Kong, Macau and at leas… [+5758 chars]

articles.author: Tom Benner
articles.title: China's would-be tourists stay put along with their dollars
articles.description: A drop in visitors from worldâ€™s largest outbound market and fears at home over outbreak take a toll on other countries.
articles.content:
Singapore - China is the world's largest source of outbound tourists. But travel bans, suspended flights, and government advisories are keeping many would-be tourists from mainland China at home - with their tourist dollars.
That means regional economies wit… [+6865 chars]

articles.title: Art Basel cancels Hong Kong fair due to Coronavirus outbreak
articles.description: The statement cited several factors informing the decision, including health concerns.
